bboxes.reason: Bounding box 6 best encompasses the entire button area corresponding to 'Soup Congee,' including its label and symbol. This satisfies the Button Selection Criteria.

The bounding box with index 1 captures the label of the 'Preset' soft pad, which represents the execution area of the element. According to the criteria for soft pads, any selection including the label text is valid.
Bounding box 14 is the only one that fully encompasses the interactive control area of the 'Reheat' button, including the pressing area and label text, making it the best fit for this element.
Bounding box 10 encapsulates the entire pressing area, label, and icon for the 'Slow Cook Stew' button. This meets the criteria for selecting the entire button region.
The bounding box with index 5 fits the clay_pot_button element as it circles the entire pressable button region, including both the icon and label.
Bounding box 7 fully encompasses the 'White Rice' button, capturing its interactive surface and ensuring it aligns with the Button Selection Criteria.
The bounding box with index 8 correctly includes the 'Jasmine Rice' button, capturing both the label and the button area, which meets the button selection criteria.

The bounding box with index 9 encloses the soft pad labeled 'Glutinous Rice', which serves as the control element. The label text in this region is the execution area, satisfying the soft pad selection criteria.
Bounding box index 11 encompasses both the label 'Cancel' and the icon above it, capturing the pressing area of the soft pad, which aligns with the selection criteria.
Bounding box 12 best captures the button area of 'Quick Cooking Steam', including the text and icon associated with it, meeting the criteria for this selection.
The bounding box 40 best fits the button area for the 'Timer' as it includes both the label and the execution area of the button, which aligns with the criteria for selecting buttons.
Bounding box 15 encapsulates both the ‘Start’ label and the button area, which validly represents the start_button control element.
Bounding box 16 best captures the area of the Brown Rice button, including both the label and the interactive area of the button, which meets the selection criteria.

Bounding box 18 fully encompasses the digital display, which is the control element to be identified. The other bounding boxes only partially cover individual segments of the display and are therefore invalid.
